General.Name: Vladimirskiy Khimicheskiy
General.Description: Public Joint Stock Company Vladimir Chemical Plant manufactures plastics for various industries in Russia. Its products include polyvinylchloride granular plastic compounds, granular polyolefin compounds, dyes, thermoplastic sheets, and sheet materials. The company was founded in 1931 and is based in Vladimir, Russia. Public Joint Stock Company Vladimir Chemical Plant operates as a subsidiary of Cheshor Enterprises Limited.
